pullRequest.title: [CALCITE-4295] Composite of two checkers with SqlOperandCountRange throws IllegalArgumentException
pullRequest.bodyText:
Root cause is:
The minMin function of CompositeOperandTypeChecker should return the minimum of lower bound of all SqlOperandCountRange.This PR will fix it.

nodes.bodyText: The title in the comment reflects the "old" title of the ticket, could it be updated?

commit.message: [CALCITE-4295] Composite of two checkers with SqlOperandCountRange throws IllegalArgumentException (Zhenghua Gao)

beforeCommit.message: [CALCITE-4295] The minMin function of CompositeOperandTypeChecker should returns the minimum of lower bound of all SqlOperandCountRange
